name: 2D splatoon 1 RPG DEMO 1.8 meme idition
description:
This is a project iv'e been working on for weeks but luckily i have a team of coders and mappers to help me but lets get to the chase this is a splatoon 1 game but in 2D with an RPG style DEMO but the full release is coming soon hopefully no setbacks for 6/5/2023 i kept my updates of the game at my discord https://discord.gg/aNUxD4Ua

sorry this game is disccontued no more updates of funny words but you still can play it im not stopping anyone
